Product Description:
This motorcycle carrier is designed for bikes with up to 5 1/2 wide tires. The carrier measures 75's and can handle motorcycles larger. The motorcycle pictured is a Suzuki 400 DRZ and measures 84's from outside tire to outside tire. Extremely lightweight combination of aluminum and powder coated steel construction - 45 lbs. (all steel carriers usually have the same weight limit but weigh much more making it difficult to carry or store- and steel will rust).

Also includes a lightweight aluminum loading ramp for loading your cycle onto the carrier and it conveniently attaches onto the carrier next to the carrier track for transport.

Maximum carrying capacity of 400 lbs. Fits a 2 square class II, III, IV, or V - trailer hitch receiver. The anti-tilt trailer hitch locking device prevents the carrier from rocking.

Works great for RV's, campers, pick up trucks, vans and SUV's.

Load your cycle from the left or right (photo shows left mount; however, carrier could be bolted in a right load position also). Assembles in minutes with only 8 bolts and nuts. The hitch tube is constructed of steel with a durable gray powder coating. The main hitch tube is 18 long from center of hitch pin to center of ramp.

Product Description:
Would you like to haul your motocross motorcycle but do not need the headaches of pulling a trailer? This carrier will help pay for itself in the fuel you will save alone by not having to pull a heavy trailer! The 600lb motorcycle carrier is just what you are looking for to ease transporting your motorcycle.

Though not shown , this is the perfect carrier for sport bikes. This motorcycle carrier is designed for bikes with up to 5 1/2 wide tires. The carrier measures 75 and can handle larger sized motorcycles. Black coated steel construction - 67 lbs.

This motorcycle carrier also includes a lightweight steel loading ramp for loading your cycle onto the carrier and it conveniently attaches onto the carrier next to the carrier track for transport. This motorcycle hitch carrier has a maximum carrying capacity of 600 lbs.

This carrier comes standard to fit in a 2 square class III, trailer hitch receiver. The anti-tilt trailer hitch locking device prevents the carrier from rocking. This unit works great for RV's, campers, pick up trucks, vans and SUV's. Load your cycle from the left or right (photo shows right mount). Assembles in minutes. The hitch tube is constructed of steel with a durable black coating. The main hitch tube is 18 long from center of hitch pin to center of ramp.

* 600lb Weight Limit
* Fits tires up to 5.5 wide
* Fits 2 square class III, trailer hitch receiver
* Lightweight steel loading ramp
* INCLUDED Anti-Wobble Attachment

Product Name: Aluminum Motorcycle Carrier Ramp with Wheel Chock
Product Description:
Prohoists Motorcycle Carrier / Trailer Motorcycle Trailer Hitch Carrier With Ramp & Front Wheel Chock


DESCRIPTION:

Would you like to haul your motocross motorcycle but do not need the headaches of pulling a trailer? This carrier will help pay for itself in the fuel you will save alone by not having to pull a heavy trailer! The 600lb motorcycle carrier is just what you are looking for to ease transporting your motorcycle. Though not shown , this is the perfect carrier for sport bikes.

This motorcycle carrier is designed for bikes with up to 5 1/2 wide tires. The carrier measures 75 's and can handle motorcycles larger. Black coated steel construction - 45 lbs.
This motorcycle carrier also includes a lightweight steel loading ramp for loading your cycle onto the carrier and it conveniently attaches onto the carrier next to the carrier track for transport.





600 LB Motorcycle Carrier Ramp

OTE: This is carrier made of heavy duty, heavy gauge steel - made to be durable and stand the test of time.

This motorcycle hitch carrier has a maximum carrying capacity of 600 lbs. This carrier comes standard to fit in a 2 square class III, trailer hitch receiver. The anti-tilt trailer hitch locking device prevents the carrier from rocking.

This unit works great for RV's, campers, pick up trucks, vans and SUV's.

Load your cycle from the left or right (photo shows right mount). Assembles in minutes. The hitch tube is constructed of steel with a durable black coating. The main hitch tube is 18 long from center of hitch pin to center of ramp.









FEATURES:

Rugged Design and Lightweight Construction
Powder Coated Finish- Track is made of Aluminum
Adjustable front wheel chock built in for stability
Accommodates all Motorcycles up to 600lbs
Total weight capacity for carrier: up to 600 Lbs.
Mounted 72 long steel loading ramp INCLUDED!!
Quick and Easy assembly
Anti-wobble device

Prohoists does not recommend loading a bike with one person!!

Would you like to haul your motocross motorcycle but do not need the headaches of pulling a trailer? This carrier will help pay for itself in the fuel you will save alone by not having to pull a heavy trailer! The PHMCS1 motorcycle carrier is just what you are looking for to ease transporting your motorcycle and an awesome upgrade from the AMC-400. This motorcycle carrier is designed for bikes with up to 5 1/2 wide tires. The carrier measures 75's and can handle motorcycles larger. Extremely lightweight combination of aluminum and powder coated steel construction - 45 lbs. (all steel carriers usually have the same weight limit but weigh much more making it difficult to carry or store- and steel will rust). This motorcycle carrier also includes a lightweight black aluminum loading ramp for loading your cycle onto the carrier and it conveniently attaches onto the carrier next to the carrier track for transport.


FEATURES:
Load your cycle from the left or right.
This motorcycle hitch carrier has a maximum carrying capacity of 400 lbs.
This carrier comes standard to fit in a 2 square class II, III, IV, or V - trailer hitch receiver.
The anti-tilt trailer hitch locking device prevents the carrier from rocking.
This unit works great for RV's, campers, pick up trucks, vans and SUV's.
The main hitch tube is 18 long from center of hitch pin to center of ramp.
The hitch tube is constructed of steel with a durable gray powder coating.
Assembles in minutes

Motorcycle Carrier Ramp NOTE: This is carrier made of heavy duty, heavy gauge aluminum - made to be durable and stand the test of time.

Product Description:
Our motorcycle stand is the perfect swing arm stand for motorcyclists who need to raise their motorcycle by the swing arm. The stand easily rolls under the motorcycle and lifts the motorcycle by the swing arm.

The swing arm stand features an adjustable width to accommodate almost every motorcycle. This swing arm stand is designed for regular swing arms and will not work with single sided swing arms.


Specifications
Length:27
Width:8.5-13
Height:14
3 Heavy duty wheels

Product Description:
Minimizes trailer hitch movement
Fuses male and female 2 trailer hitch receivers together

Helps prevent damage to your trailer hitch receiver by preventing the male end from twisting and cracking or warping the female end

2 Sided to fit most most modern hitches

Product Description:
Helps Turn You Into A Professional Photographer

The 24 X 24 X 24 AND 17 X 17 X 17 professional series photo tent has a large front opening to allow for easy studio images in your home or office. The studio kit comes standard with a custom carrying case with both shoulder and hand carrying straps. Inside you will find the 2 studio soft light tents ready for fast setup (within a few seconds), a FULL SIZE camera mono-pod, 2 lights, and 8 varieties of background colors (4 for each tent).

Quickly Sets Up/Collapses Out Of A Convenient Protective Carrying Case At Home Or In Your Office

Convenient Size: 24 x 24 x 24 AND 17 X 17 X 17Still Shot 2 (TM) SOFT LIGHT BOX: You will find 2 professional series photo tents conveniently stored away inside the free travel bag. Within a few seconds, it sets up nearly anywhere you desire. It's specially woven heat resistant 100% nylon fiber material will illuminate what you are photographing without casting shadows and glares.

Filters the light to prevent shadows and reflections

Gives a clean professional backdrop to all items being photographed

Can be lit by flash, fluorescent, quartz, tungsten and flood lights.

Softens and reflects light for soft, enhancing shadows

Eliminates glare and hot spots

Bathes object in light for beautiful dimensional lighting

Works with daylight or artificial light

Includes a seamless background for clutter-free shots

Eliminates unwanted reflection on metallic objects

Allows for easy insertion and support of paper or poster board for colored backgrounds

Easy to set up and easy to store

EIGHT BACKGROUNDS:
Included are red, white, blue, and black non reflective polyester fabric backgrounds for each tent.

Still Shot 2 (TM) 2 HIGH OUTPUT LIGHTS:
Inside two of the protective compartments within the case, you will find 2 high output 5100K Halide lamps. Each has retractable legs; so, simply pull out of the pocket, retract the legs, position outside of the tent, plug into the wall, and turn each on. Each measures 8 high with an extra long 8' power cord. 110v/50w UL listed for your safety.

Still Shot 2 (TM) CAMERA MONO-POD:
This Camera or Video telescopic tripod is what you need to help provide a professional still shot photo. It is extremely lightweight and compact for easy transport. The tripod pictured within the photo tent is NOT included. We discovered the tripod is to tall for use with the photo tents and now include the mono-pod pictured.

3-section legs
Quick-release leg locks
on-slip feet
Lightweight frame
Quick-release platform
360-degree swivel pan head
Adjustable tilt controls
Adjustable pan controls
90-degree adjustable vertical platform

Each measures 8 high with an extra long 8' power cord. 110v/50w UL listed for your safety.

Product Description:
The 32 X 32 X 32 AND 12 X 12 X 12 professional series photo tent has a large front opening to allow for easy studio images in your home or office. Each tent comes standard with a custom carrying case. Inside each case you will find the 2 studio soft light tents ready for fast setup (within a few seconds), and 8 varieties of background colors (4 for each tent).

Helps Turn Your Photos Into Professional Quality Photographs
Quickly Sets Up/Collapses Out Of A Convenient Protective Carrying Case At Home Or In Your Office
Convenient Size: 32 x 32 x 32 AND 12 X 12 X 12
Filters the light preventing unwanted reflections and shadows
Gives a professional clean look to all items being photographed
Can be lit by fluorescent, flash, quartz, flood and tungsten lights
Reflects and Softens light for soft, enhanced shadows
Hot Spots and Glare are easily eliminated
Beautiful dimensional lighting by bathing objects in light
Works well with artificial light or daylight
Seamless background for clutter-free shots is also included
Removes unwanted reflection on metallic objects
Easily allows insertion and support of poster board or paper for colored backgrounds
Simple set up and easy to store desig


SOFT LIGHT BOXES:
You will find 2 professional series photo tents conveniently stored away inside the free travel bag. Within a few seconds, it sets up nearly anywhere you desire. It's specially woven heat resistant 100% nylon fiber material will illuminate what you are photographing without casting shadows and glares.

CAMERA FULL SIZE TRIPOD:
This Camera or Video telescopic tripod is what you need to help provide a professional still shot photo. It is extremely lightweight and compact for easy transport. This newly added tripod has a full range in height, tilting/ rotating camera pan head, bubble leveler, and rubber foot rests.

# 4-section tripod legs
# Quick-release leg locks
# Non-slip rubber feet
# Lightweight frame
# Quick-release platform
# 3 way pan head quick release plate
# 360-degree swivel and tilting pan head
# Adjustable tilt controls
# Adjustable pan controls
# 90-degree adjustable vertical platform
# Maximum operating height 50 (1275mm)
# Minimum operating height 16.7 (425mm)
# Weight 28.9 oz (820g)
# Custom carrying case with shoulder strap

EIGHT BACKGROUNDS:
Includes black, white, blue, and red non reflective polyester fabric backgrounds for each tent.

2 PREMIUM LIGHTS & STANDS:
Inside two of the protective compartments within the case, you will find 2 high output full spectrum 30 watt/ 5400k daylight fluorescent lamps. Each provides cool energy efficient lighting. Each light tripod has adjustable legs and lamp neck allowing for the precise desired height and lamp head angle. Notice the optional side or upright lamp neck in the photos below. This combination will help provide a professional Still Shot image.

Professional quality, pressure die-cast aluminum construction.

Versatile and compact.
Solid locking capabilities with quick-release levers.

ylon Constructio

Product Description:
3 TON (6000 LB) HYDRAULIC RAM makes it e.a.s.y!

The base swivels a complete 360 degrees! Roller Bering Base with a grease fitting for smooth easy turns There is an arm in the back to help rotate the crane into position There is a quick disconnect from the base for easy storing A Locking handle at the base to keep the crane in position The arm extends and reaches a maximum height of 8 feet The arm has up to a 1/2 ton lifting capacity (1000 pounds) There is a drain hole on the bottom of the plate to help prevent any cylinder moisture pooling




  • Height to pivot point on arm: 50 Length of boom extended: 54" Length of boom retracted: 39"
  • Size of base plate: 11" x 11"
  • Color of the item may vary from the item pictured (red).Easy to paint any color.
  • This item ships in 2 large heavy boxes.
"

Product Description:
This 4' long PWC harness is designed with the newer heavier and longer PWC models in mind. Over the years, PWC's have become increasingly longer and heavier. However, the lifting harness has remained basically unchanged until this models creation. It's tremendous 4' length allows for a much more stable and balanced lift for nearly any PWC. Although it is capable of lifting the smallest jet ski made, it is especially designed for the 2+ seater PWCs. With it's 1500# rated maximum capacity, it is built to last. In our opinion, it has become the most versatile and strongest PWC sling on the market!

Maximum rating of 1,500 pounds

This lifting harness is recommended for all 2+seater PWC's with a hull length greater than 9'.

RUBBER COATED FOR YOUR PWC PROTECTION!

Approximate measurements:
47 1/2 Long Cradle
45 High Strap

(universal cradle / sling for Seadoo, Jet Ski, Yamaha, Kawasaki, Honda, Polaris etc.)

Product Description:
Here is a Dock or Seawall mount hydraulic hoist for your personal water craft (PWC), Dingy, etc. Or even use the hoist in your workshop, garage, truck, etc. to lift and move objects up to 1/2 tons with ease!


3 TON (6000 LB) HYDRAULIC RAM makes it e.a.s.y!

INCLUDES MANUAL WINCH, CABLE & HOOK

The base swivels a complete 360 degrees!


There is a quick disconnect from the base for easy storing
A Locking handle at the base to keep the crane in position
The arm extends and reaches a maximum height of 8 feet
The arm has up to a 1/2 ton lifting capacity (1000 pounds)

Painted Steel
Galvanized Cable
1 year Manufacturer Warranty
Base 11x11 Inches

Product Description:
The Side Mount Ladder Truck Rack is extremely rugged and versatile. This rack is constructed of a strong and lightweight aluminum material. It is an excellent tool for anchoring down ladders, lumber, pipe and many other items. The contractor will enjoy the versatility of this rack.

The side mount ladder rack is expandable from 16-30's in width and also allows for height adjustment. Each is rated for up to 250 lbs!

DRILLING IS REQUIRED.They are permanently installed by drilling brackets inside the truck bed. It will fit ANY truck with conventional bed rails. A thread setter tool will be need and is not included.

OTE: Aluminum version has no paint and therefore has aluminum anodized finish. We will update images soon.
Ford, Chevy / Chevrolet, Dodge, GMC, Nissan, Toyota

Product Description:
WHEELCHAIR CARRIER & RAMP

This wheelchair carrier is designed to allow easy loading and transporting of your wheelchair, scooter or other item.

Each carrier includes a extra long 5' ramp when fully extended. It quickly folds and locks for transporting. The ramp will also detach if not needed or for storage.

The entire carrier has the option of tilting upward and locking in the upright position for transporting without a load. This allows more parking room within your garage or elsewhere.

Quick release spring loaded pins allow for easy unlocking of the ramp.

Large hand cut-outs allow easy lifting of the carrier. Each cut-out has a rubber insert for padding.

Handles also allow easy controlled lifting of the carrier.

Anti-Wobble Device fuses the carrier and the trailer hitch receiver together to reduce movement and prevent trailer hitch receiver damage.

Reflectors Included For Your Safety.

Inside (usable) platform measurements: 46.5 width X 28 length X 4 high rail.

This carrier is now being used by Segway owners! Fits 1 Segways (XL holds 2 Segways).
REQUIRES CLASS III 2 HITCH
Loading Ramps folds upward towards platform, as well a lengthwise.

Product Name: Laptop Mount Stand for Car or Truck
Product Description:
Premium Laptop Car Adjustable Mount

This premium adjustable laptop computer mount is an ideal product for business professionals who commonly work on the road. This will enable you to have your laptop securely mounted to the stand and create invoices, work orders, estimates, etc. Our customers commonly include private investigators, contractors, delivery drivers, and many occupations.
This premium laptop mount can be installed into your truck, car, SUV, or even a semi-truck. The laptop mount is installed using the seat bolt installation kit, that is included, or if this application will not fit your vehicle an optional bolt mount kit will work for you.

Laptop is secured with included Velcro straps
Multiple adjustment points for optimal fit
Adjustable Height
o drilling required
Desktop includes cooling holes to allow your laptop to breath/ release heat!
Video Recorders can also mount to the laptop stand

DRILLING IS REQUIRED. They are permanently installed by drilling brackets inside the truck bed. It will fit ANY truck with conventional bed rails. A thread setter tool is required and Not Included.

Ford, Chevy / Chevrolet, Dodge, GMC, Nissan, Toyota

PLEASE NOTE:
THESE NO LONGER HAVE THE RED CAPS (now a matching black)

Product Description:
This wheelchair carrier is designed to allow easy loading and transporting of your wheelchair, scooter or other item. Each carrier includes a 42 ramp when fully extended. It quickly folds and locks for transporting. The ramp will also detach if not needed or for storage. The entire carrier has the option of tilting upward and locking in the upright position for transporting without a load. This allows more parking room within your garage or elsewhere. Quick release spring loaded pins allow for easy unlocking of the ramp. Large hand cut-outs allow easy lifting of the carrier. Each cut-out has a rubber insert for padding. Handles also allow easy controlled lifting of the carrier. Anti-Wobble Device fuses the carrier and the trailer hitch receiver together to reduce movement and prevent trailer hitch receiver damage. Reflectors Included For Your Safety. Inside (usable) platform measurements: 46.5 width X 28 length X 4 high rail. Please note that this item requires a Class III 2 inch hitch.

42 Long Loading Ramp
Holds up to 400lbs
Reflectors Included For Your Safety.
Class III 2 Inch Hitch required
Loading Ramps folds upward towards platform.

Product Name: Laptop Mount Stand for Car or Truck
Product Description:
NEW PREMIER LAPTOP COMPUTER MOUNT FOR CAR TRUCK AUTO OR HOME

If you're looking for the best computer mount available at a reasonable price, then look no further!



For use with your laptop (notebook) or reading materials or can be used as a portable use as a desk in your car or truck.

Pivots at multiple points to allow the exact position you desire when in use or not in use
Remove from your car and use inside your home or office.
Instant release lever
Collapses for compact storing or to move out of the way when not in use
Heavy duty lightweight forged aluminum construction - no rust!
Strong aluminum desktop- not plastic!
Computer attaches with velcro straps- Included.
Adjustable height
Tilt laptop to position of comfort
This is the best computer, portable desk, on the market! After you use one, we bet you will be back for another set for possibly your home, office, boat, R.V., plane, another car, golf cart, or gift to a family member or friend!

Laptop Computer Mount for Car Police Desk or Table


The tray is constructed of a high-quality aluminum alloy. Designed for easy set up, and removal it's multi-functional and can be used as a bookstand, dining table, or desk. It includes two velcro belts by which you can affix your laptop. Tray size is 12 3/4 in wide by 10 in tall.

The high quality aluminum arm telescopically adjusts easily to accommodate variety of heights and set ups.

Quick release handles allow for fast adjustments.

The quick release pedestal design allows rapid assembly and disassembly.

The joints have meshed tooth design to prevent any slipping. When the joints are locked it will hold steadfast and will not slip.

The extended connecting bracket allows for stable support and adjustment.

Three pieces of link bracket can be integrated with the mounting to a passenger seat perfectly - no drilling is required for installation and it can adapt to a variety of vehicle types!

Product Description:
The Prohoist 48 Inch Cargo Carrier is the perfect travel companion. It is versatile and convenient for many applications including Road Trips, Tailgating (for Sports Fans) or Trips to the beach. If you can fit it you can tote it. From coolers to lawn mowers this carrier is second to none. This carrier is designed for Class III - 2 Inch hitches (Not Included).

The entire carrier has the option of tilting upward and locking in the upright position for transporting without a load. This allows more parking room within your garage or elsewhere. The carrier will also detach if not needed or for storage. Anti-Wobble Device fuses the carrier and the trailer hitch receiver together to reduce movement and prevent trailer hitch receiver damage.

* 48 x 19 3/4 Mesh Platform
* Cargo Carrier Dimensions 48 inches(length)x 19.3/4 inches(width) x 6 inches high (rails)
* Free Anti Wobble Attachment
* Max Capacity: 500 lbs.
* Fits Standard 2 receivers

Powder Coated Black Finish
Weighs approximately 28 Lbs.
Measures approximately 80's in height
Maximum Load Weight is 100 lbs.

Quiet, Realistic Resistance, Durable, Sturdy and Adjustable

Train indoors when the weather is inhospitable - from sprints, to intervals, to a long cruise, this trainer will provide you with the ride you want. This trainer is ideal for bringing your road-work indoors whether you're a seasoned pro or just starting your bike training.

Increase resistance by shifting through the gears on your bike using the internal magnet system for a quiet ride
Larger-than-average 3 in. roller reduces tire wear
Heavy-Duty construction - this trainer can take your punishment
21.5 inch extra wide frame base provides maximum stability
Frame is welded to ensure it holds your bike level
Dimensions: 21.5x18.5x15 (WxDxH)
Mounting cups ensure that your bike won't slip out of your trainer
Engineered for fast setup and removal
Highly portable - take it with you!
Compatible with all bikes with a 26, 27 or 700c wheel
Trainer folds in half for easy transport and off-season storage
Quick release levers for getting your bike out fast and easy

Work on your bike like the pros do

OVERDRIVE SPORTS GEAR

BICYCLE REPAIR STAND

This is the stand you need when you need to make repairs or adjustments to your bike. Built to provide rock-solid stability, with a wide stance, this stand will enable you to get the work done on your bike that you need to do - maintenance, repairs, replacements, etc - it's all possible with this stand.

Tool tray - convenient for placing your tools, nuts, bolts or other items that have a way of sneaking off when you're not looking

Product Description:
This hitch adapter is made to convert a vehicles 1 1/4 hitch to a 2 hitch. This is a perfect solution when your bike rack requires a 2 hitch!


Please keep in mind this does not change the class of hitch you have installed. The weight and towing capacity of the underlining hitch is the same weight capacity when using this hitch.

Solid steel constructio
Black powder coated finish

Product Name: Heavy Duty 4 Bike Foldable Tire Mount Carrier
Product Description:
The Ultra Duty 4 Bike wheel mount carrier is made to carry up to 4 bicycles by gripping the wheels and securing the bike frame to the carrier with the vertical hooks. The bike carrier has a 200lb weight limit and is made of durable powder coated steel. A 2 Hitch receiver is required to transport with this bike rack.

Ultra Duty 4 Bike Folding Specifications
200lb weight limit
2 hitch receiver required for use
Straps are not needed to secure the bikes
Cushioned hooks secure the bike to the carrier frame
Black powder coated steel
4 bike capacity
Dimensions: 35L x 56.5W x 26.5 T
Tire cradle dimensions: 14.25 L x 3.5W

Product Name: Heavy Duty Wheel Mount 4 Bike Hitch Rack
Product Description:
The BL-4 Wheel mount bicycle rack will allow you to easily transport your bicycles. The bike carrier has a 150lb weight limit and can transport up to 4 bikes. The wheel mount design is ideal for downhill bikes, mountain bikes, or bicycles that have a curved top tube that is not compatible with traditional bike carriers. The bike carrier is made of durable powder coated steel to ensure a safe and reliable product. This BL-4 will fit bicycles with a wheel base from 50 to 76.

A 2 hitch receiver is required to transport with this bicycle carrier. We do not recommend using this product with a 1 1/4 hitch receiver and adapter due to the weight and force on the hitch. The wheel cradles are adjustable in distance to allow for a variety of bicycles with different wheelbase lengths. 4 Frame grab bars are included to secure the bicycle to the carrier frame.

BL-4 Wheel Mount Bike Rack Specifications
Durable powder coated steel constructio
Wheel mount design is compatible with downhill bicycles and bikes with irregular top tubes
Weighs 54lbs
2 Hitch receiver is required for use
Adjustable wheel cradle wheel distance
2 Piece design allows for transportation of only 2 bikes or 4 when fully connected
Frame grabbers secure the bikes to the bike carrier

Product Description:
This Genuine bicycle lift is an excellent solution for creating more floor space in your home's garage! Simply attach the hooks to your bike, lift and lock.

Attach the rubber coated hooks to the seat and handle bar (the coating protects your bike from scratches). Each lift uses a pulley system to allow easy lifting of bicycles weighing up to 50 lbs. With it's extra long rope, you can mount the lift up to 12 feet high. Once you easily raise the bicycle to the desired height, lock and tie off the rope onto the included cleat. For safety purposes, there is an accidental release locking mechanism.

Each easily mounts onto your ceiling joist by itself or pre-mount to a standard 2x4 board and then attach it to the ceiling (directions for both methods are included).

Product Description:
This is an extension for our 11' drywall hoist (fits most other brands too). It will allow installation of drywall, panels, boards, etc... to up to 16' high (19' if you include half of the drywall height with a wall installation). Color may vary (yellow or red)

Will match drywall lift set when purchased at the same time.

Product Name: 2000 lb Galvanized Truck Hoist Davit Jib With Manual Winch
Product Description:
Galvanized Truck Hoist Jib Crane Davit Cherry Picker 2000lb

Prohoist's 2000lb Truck Hoist Cherry Picker features a 2000lb weight capacity to assist your in lifting heavy items.This hoist is recommended for use in salt water environments as well as environments that are more prone to moisture. The truck hoist has a 6000lb hydraulic ram for lifting vertical. The base of this truck hoist swivels completely 360 degrees for limitless operation! After the optimal position is found a locking handle at the base of the crane davit keeps the crane in place.

We strongly recommend purchasing a LOAD LEVELER when lifting any heavy objects with the davit crane. The load leveler balances the heavy weight on the davit. http://www.prohoists.com/Engine_Hoist_Load_Leveler_2_Ton_4000_lb

The arm extends to a maximum of 8 feet. A drain hole has been engineered into the davit crane to allow any moisture to properly leave the crane.This not only improves safety but drastically lengthens the life span of this truck hoist. The truck hoist can be mounted to any surface that is strong enough to support the weight of the davit and the weight of the items being lifted. The truck hoist crane can be removed from the base to allow for storage and ease of transportation.

Size of base plate: 11 x 11
Height to pivot point on arm: 50 Length of boom extended: 54 Length of boom retracted: 39
Galvanized Steel
2000lb Weight Limit
Oversized 6000lb hydraulic ram


  • Height to pivot point on arm: 50
  • Length of boom extended: 54"
  • Length of boom retracted: 39"
  • Size of base plate: 11" x 11"
"

24-40 DRYWALL STILTS

Drywall and Painter Stilts
Drywall Stilts

Painters and Drywallers - are you tired of ladders and scaffolding? What about those hard to reach out of the way spots? Look no further. These Drywall Stilts are for you.

Drywall & Painter's Stilts!

230 lbs weight limit

3 Position Adjustable Heel Cup

Product Description:
FUELN (TM) 1 new 20 gallon per minute 12 volt fuel transfer pump.

This is an excellent pump for kerosene, gasoline, diesel and many other fluids. Includes a high flow manual nozzle, 20 GPM pump, dispensing hose, and suction hose. The motor is housed inside a heavy duty cast iron casing. Rotary Vein Pump Will Run Off Your Truck 12V battery This unit is equipped with an endless screen and strainer 10 ft maximum vertical pump for diesel fuel (9' for gas)- distance from the surface of the fluid within the tank 11' 6 filling hose Adjustable suction hose: 41 - 23.5 1 diameter hoses 30 minute continuous duty cycle Manual nozzle with automatic emergency shut off

Product Description:
This lock on tree stand has a capacity of 275 pounds weighing only 18 pounds! Equipped with a nylon padded seat this stand is ready for your venture outdoors. This stand is convenient and easy to transport. An ample platform provides a nice foot-rest while you keep your eyes focused on tracking game.

Specs:

Material: Steel
Weight Capacity: 275 Pounds
Dimensions: 28.5 x 18 x 21 inches
Included in this package:

1 padded seat cushion
1 seat frame
1 tree connection brace
1 claw ratchet strap
1 seat support framework
2 platform cable supports
1 claw push-button stabilizing strap
1 platform
2 backpack straps
1 8mm x 1/2 inch bolt
1 8mm lock nut

!IMPORTANT NOTICE! You must wear a Fall Arrest System (FAS)/Safety harness at all times while the stand is in use, including climbing and descending. Failure to use a Fall Arrest System could result in serious injury or death. Be careful!

An ample platform provides a nice foot-rest while you keep your eyes focused on tracking game.Specs:Material: Steel Weight Capacity: 275 Pounds Dimensions: 28.5 x 18 x 21 inches Included in this package:1 padded seat cushion 1 seat frame 1 tree connection brace 1 claw ratchet strap 1 seat support framework 2 platform cable supports 1 claw push-button stabilizing strap 1 platform 2 backpack straps 1 8mm x 1/2 inch bolt 1 8mm lock nut !IMPORTANT NOTICE! You must wear a Fall Arrest System (FAS)/Safety harness at all times while the stand is in use, including climbing and descending. Failure to use a Fall Arrest System could result in serious injury or death. Be careful!

This blind is a perfect fit for just about anything you hunt. Providing great cover in both tall grasslands, as well as wooded areas, this blind is versatile and mobile if you need to pick up and move quickly. This blind provides great concealment! Whether you're hunting fowl, deer, or other big game this blind is the answer you're looking for!

Quick and easy deployment
Provides anchors to prevent it from being blown away in high winds
Great for Nature photographers looking to get close to their subjects!

Product Name: Deer Hoist Hitch Mount 600lb with Foot Base
Product Description:
This product, in our opinion, is one of the best truck deer lifts available on the market at one of the best prices.

It easily and securely attaches to any standard 2 trailer hitch receiver.

Powder coated for durability.

ew foot extension: lower the base to touch the ground to create a solid connection to the ground. This prevents bouncing as you skin or dress your big game.


It has an adjustable height with a quick release locking pin and a winch with cable.

PLEASE NOTE: DUE TO THE SIZE AND WEIGHT, THIS ITEM SHIPS TO THE LOWER 48 STATES ONLY.

Revised & Improved 2013 Model

Capable of lifting up to 600 pounds!

Drop your Truck's Tailgate with even a full size truck! (Especially the long tailgates as the Ford-150's)

It Swivels! 360 Degrees

Please take notice that most other models are only capable of lifting 300 lbs., they may not swivel and many do not include a handle to easily rotate the game with more control and leverage into your truck bed . In our opinion, this is by far the best quality game lifts at the absolute best value!

It quickly breaks down for easy storage or transportation.
Make your big game cleaning easy no matter where you decided to hunt!

Designed to cater to those hunters who hunt new, multiple areas, by themselves, and/or to save your back! Carry this lift with you where ever you hunt, lift the big game up with the winch and not your back, pivot the game into your truck bed and lower. Or use the lift to raise the game off the ground to the desired level of height for easy skinning or cleaning. Attach a scale between the hook and gambrel hanger and now you can now accurately inform your buddies of the actual weight of your game without having to guess (scale not included ).

Our truck deer hoist also allows you to lower your truck's tail gate while the deer lift is mounted into the hitch. The deer lift is made of extremely strong square steel tubing. The top portion of the truck deer lift swivels to lift the deer or hog into your truck bed and also locks in place to provide a secure stand to hang the catch while cleaning.

The Deer Hoist mounts to a 2 inch class II hitch or stronger. If the maximum weight limit of the vehicle's tongue is less than 600lbs the effective weight limit is the tongue weight limit. Even though this deer hoist is typically used with a truck, it can also be used on SUV's as long as the receiver hitch can hold the weight of the deer and the deer hoist.

Truck Deer Hoist Specifications

600lb weight capacity with foot base
Tailgate lowers even with deer hoist mounted
Manual winch to raise and lower
Mounts to Class III 2 Hitch Receiver
Deer hoist winch included for easy lifting
Protevtive Bearing Cap
Four Locking Pin Adjustments

Product Description:
Truck Hitch Deer Hoist with Foot base

Product Descriptio

Our truck deer hoist was built to assist hunters who hunt deer, big game, hogs or any other animal up to 300lbs. This deer hoist lift has a 300lb weight limit with the included foot base. To use simply lower the gambrel hook (Not Included) with the manual winch, hook the deer or hog onto the hook and pull up with the winch. You can place the game into your truck bed. Or field dress / gut and clean or both!

Our 300lb Deer lift is the smaller sibling of our popular 600lb Deer Hoist model. Our truck deer hoist also allows you to lower your truck's tail gate while the deer lift is mounted into the hitch. The Deer Lift is made of strong square steel tubing. The top portion of the truck deer lift swivels to lift the deer or hog into your truck bed and also locks in place to provide a secure stand to hang the catch while cleaning.

The Deer Hoist mounts to a 2 inch class II hitch or stronger. If the maximum weight limit of the vehicle's tongue is less than 300lbs the effective weight limit is the tongue weight limit. Even though this deer hoist is typically used with a truck, it can also be used on SUV's as long as the receiver hitch can hold the weight of the deer and the deer hoist.




Truck Deer Hoist Specifications

300lb weight capacity with foot base.
Tailgate lowers even with deer hoist mounted.
Manual winch to raise and lower.
Mounts to Class III 2 Hitch Receiver.
Deer hoist winch included for easy lifting.

Product Description:
Bigfoot Camouflage Hat

Velcro Adjustable
Bigfoot Camouflage Patter
Each hat's camouflage pattern will vary depending on what portion of the material is used to make each individual hat. The material for each hat is cut from a roll of material with the full pattern measuring 4x4'. So, each hat is unique but will be very similar to the hat pictured.

The hat says Bigfoot Camouflage, The Art Of Hiding on the logo pictured in front of the hat and www.bigfootcamo.com on the rear of the hat. Each is embroidered.

There are embroidered rifle scope like cross hairs on the bill of each cap.

Product Description:
NEW !

20' TAILGATING FLAG POLE and AMERICAN FLAG!

This is one of the highest quality tailgating & telescoping flagpole at the least expensive price available on the internet! This is the most Versatile flagpole we have ever offered.

The Telegater is not ONE but TWO Flagpoles in One. Not only is this flagpole mobile for Tailgating , It also collapses after the Game and Can Be set up just as easily in your front Yard. No More wasted space in the garage. Fly your colors , Support your Team and show Your Pride all year long.

Other tailgating flagpoles flex significantly as even shown in their photos. This is not good if you treasure your vehicle's paint!!

16 gauge Aluminum 20' Telescopic Flag Pole

Heavy duty & will not rust
o Assembly Other than fitting into the wheel stand
Fly up to 2 Flags! (Military, State Flags, Sports Flags, Merchant Flags, and more available)

Collapses to approximately 70's (if this is too long, we recommend a sectional flagpole used in conjunction with our 2 wheel stand)

Wheel Stand Included


Excellent for home, RV's, campgrounds, etc

Item ships in 2 boxes

Product Name: 8 x 12 Foot USA Nylon Embroidered Flag

Show your patriotism with this high-quality Embroidered Nylon US Flag!

8x12 Embroidered USA Nylon flag (3' x 5', 4 x 6', 6'x10' also available).

The nylon flag is the flag of choice due to its durability, color, and strength. It's lightweight so it will fly easily in a light breeze for stunning effect. It's contructed with double stitched strips and edges with reinforced grommets.

This is a high-quality, long lasting flag built to fly!

Product Name: Pet Stroller: Blue Pet Stroller For Dogs
Product Description:
Pet Stroller: Blue Pet Stroller For Dogs
Product Descriptio
This pet stroller for dogs is made of quality steel and nylon construction. The nylon material is blue and features netting to prevent your dog from jumping out of the carrier. The pet stroller is made for dogs but could be used for other pets as well.

Our pet stroller is perfect for older dogs or smaller dogs who may tire quickly while on walks or for those who wish to take their pets with them wherever they go. A key feature this pet stroller has is the 2 cup holder, perfect for use when exercising. The lower storage basket can be used to hold pet supplies.

Pet Stroller Specifications
Blue nylon material
2 Cup holders
34L x 15 W x 38 H
Wheel Locks to prevent movement
Front, top, rear mesh ventilatio
2 leash connectors
Lower storage basket for pet supplies

Product Name: Denver Wheel Boot Lock - Heavy Duty Claw
Product Description:
NEW WHEEL CLAW TIRE BOOT LOCK

CAUTION: When fitting to alloy wheels it may be necessary to use some form of padding to protect the wheel from being scratched.


Fits tire widths from 6 inches to 10 inches
Compact and Lightweight for travel
Universal Desig
Quick, Quiet & simple Desig
o Compromise Security for cars, Trailers, Golf carts, Tractors, ATV's

For Parking Enforcement, Lawn Tractors, Police/Law Enforcement, Golf Carts Boat Trailers

The Heavy Duty Wheel lock will foil the plans of thieves and vandals. Shown here attached to a wheel making it impossible to easily steal your equipment and ruin your day. Works just like a Wheel Boot Lock, except you do not owe a bunch of money in parking tickets. This wheel works on everything from utility vehicles and trailers to cars and pick up trucks.

Prevent the theft of your mower, compressor, John Deere Gator, tractor, golf cart, ATV, motorcycle, trailers or any other wheeled equipment that is prone to be stolen. Very similar in looks and application to the famous Denver Boot, which is used by cities to lock the cars of parking ticket scofflaws.

The Heavy Duty Wheel lock is adjustable in width and comes with keys. Stop the thieves from moving your equipment from where you parked it and send them somewhere else to do their misdeeds!

This is also an excellent tool to prevent parking in unassigned areas at your office, apartment complex, school, etc.

Please do not use the wheel boot to play pranks on your buddies!

Product Description:
NEW STATIC STICKER FOR BOOT-LOCKED CARS

WARNING
Static Sticker
Use this plastic static sticker in conjunction with your wheel boot lock!

Immobilized cars will get the message loud an clear about what's going on with their car.

Perfect for Law Enforcement, parking enforcement on campus and schools and other places where a boot lock would be applied!

Immobilized Car Static Sticker
Make sure that the driver of the car that you've immobilized gets the message and a clear warning that their car isn't going anywhere.


The sticker reads:

WARNING

Do not attempt to drive your vehicle with the attached device! To make arrangements for the removal of the Wheel Boot Lock Please call:

We are not responsible for damage caused by any effort to drive with the attached device. You are responsible for any damage caused to this locking device. As a courtesy, we have attached the Wheel Boot Lock instead of having your car towed to save you money.

If you use Wheel Boot Locks at all this is an essential element to your efforts in enforcing parking rules and regulations!

Product Description:
Universal Roof Bars
Product Descriptio
These Universal Roof Bars are ideal for car, trucks or SUV's that do not have roof racks or bars. The roof bar kit includes 2 bars, 4 bases, 4 base rubber protectors, 4 straps and 4 mounting clips. The universal bar carrier mounts to your vehicle with the use of the mounting clips and straps. The mounting clips grip the vehicles window door seam.

Universal Roof Bars Specifications
Bar length: 48
Bar diameter: 1
Mounting hole widths: 36, 38, 40
Base dimensions:5x3
Bar height from vehicle roof: 2.75
Strap length: 40
Adjustable base mounting holes

Product Description:
LARGE CHRISTMAS TREE STORAGE CARRIER BAG UP TO 9 FEET

The XXL heavy duty strength Christmas tree storage bag is capable of holding up to a 9 foot tall unassembled artificial tree! It is constructed of a durable lightweight tear proof polypropylene material. Each features a full length zipper for easy insertion or removal of your tree. It also includes a strong handle to allow for easy transport.


  • Measures 65 X 15" x 30" (LxWxH)
  • Made of tear-proof polypropylene
  • Sturdy Carry Handle
  • Holds up to a 9' tall Christmas tree
  • Designed to protect your tree from damage

Product Description:
NEW ARCH WOOD FRAME HAMMOCK WITH TEAK FINISH

Add style, beauty and comfort to your patio, porch, or backyard!

Perfect for relaxation after a hard day working in the yard or after an outdoor grilling feast! Set this hammock and stand up in minutes and start enjoying the great outdoors!

This adds great style to any back yard, porch or patio.

This hammock is designed to be incredibly comfortable. It's made of durable, and comfortable cotton, but is not meant to be left outdoors. Once you're done for the night make sure you take your hammock with you indoors to preserve it for maximum life.

This hammock and stand is easy to assemble in just minutes. Want to use a different hammock than the one that came with it? No problem - most single and double hammocks will fit on the mounting hooks in this frame.


The package includes:

Beautiful arched wood frame with teak finish
Cotton hammock
All hardware
Instructions


  • Frame length is 10 ft
  • arch height is 3 ft
  • Box length: 60x8x15
  • 52 pounds

NEW ARCH WOOD FRAME HAMMOCK WITH TEAK FINISH

Add style, beauty and comfort to your patio, porch, or backyard!

Perfect for relaxation after a hard day working in the yard or after an outdoor grilling feast! Set this hammock and stand up in minutes and start enjoying the great outdoors!

This adds great style to any back yard, porch or patio.

This hammock is designed to be incredibly comfortable. It's made of durable, and comfortable cotton, but is not meant to be left outdoors. Once you're done for the night make sure you take your hammock with you indoors to preserve it for maximum life.

This hammock and stand is easy to assemble in just minutes. Want to use a different hammock than the one that came with it? No problem - most single and double hammocks will fit on the mounting hooks in this frame.


The package includes:

Beautiful arched wood frame with teak finish
Cotton hammock
All hardware
Instructions


  • Frame length is 10 ft
  • arch height is 3 ft
  • Box length: 60x8x15
  • 52 pounds

Product Description:
The folding poker table top will allow you to transform any table into a full poker table, ready for at home tournaments or games. The folding poker table is made of durable 1/2 thick wood and is completely covered in green or blue felt. The octagon design of the poker table comfortably fits 8 players along with 8 cup holders and chip holders. This table is very convenient and is very easy to transport.

The table folds twice to fit into the included durable nylon carrying case. Once the table is completely folded the table dimensions are around 24 x 24.

Assembling the table is extremely easy. Simply unzip the case, and unfold the poker table and you are ready to play!

Folding Poker Table Benefits

Transform any table into a full poker table
Octagon shape fits up to 8 players
Folding Poker Table Specifications

Unfolded Dimensions: 48 x 48
1/2 Thick
Folded Dimensions: 24 x 20 x 10
Octagon shape with cup holders and chip holders
Green or blue felt

Our tall cast iron grinder features a heavy duty cast iron design. It easily attaches securely to most table tops or counters with the included table mounting brackets. Our adjustable grinder allows you to grind from coarse to fine grains. With a solid sturdy construction and a look and design that will fit in any kitchen, how can you go wrong?

Portable and Multipurpose

Product Name: Wheelchair Carrier Rack Hitch Mount Tilt and Carry
Product Description:
Designed to allow easy loading and transporting of your wheelchair.

The entire carrier has the option of tilting upward and locking in the upright position for transporting without a load. This allows more parking room within your garage or elsewhere.

The WCR 100 is one of the easiest and most versatile carriers on the market.

The WCR 100 is the perfect match for transporting standard fold-able wheelchairs.

Simple and Quick Installation.

Holds up to 100lbs

Accommodates Most Standard Wheelchair's.
The WCR 100 can be easily removed and stored in your trunk.

Tilt Spring allows for easy unlocking of the ramp.

Handles also allow easy controlled lifting of the carrier.

Anti-Wobble Device fuses the carrier and the trailer hitch receiver together to reduce movement and prevent trailer hitch receiver damage.

Ratchet Strap Included For Your Safety.

eed Extra Ratchet or Cam Straps? We have them available in our store so please see our other Listings. We will combine items and waive the shipping fee for the straps (must be included together for 1 shipment - Please, request a custom invoice AFTER you finish shopping and we will waive the strap shipping fee manually and send you and invoice).

Inside (usable) platform measurements: 28 width X 16 length .

Weighs under 25lbs.

Please note that this item requires a Class III 2 inch hitch. However, it can be used with an adapter for Class I & II (Not Included)

Product Description:
Wheelchair Carrier Cover

Keep your wheelchair covered during transport. As many of you probably already know, when transporting a wheelchair on a carrier it tends to collect dirt or moisture. This cover is designed specifically for preventing rain, dirt and other elements from attaching to your wheelchair while transporting on your carrier.

Highly weather resistant
Velcro Form Fitted
Easily Adjusts to most Wheelchairs
Dimensions: 28w x 42l x 36h

Product Name: Computer Table for Bed or Chair
Product Description:
Computer Laptop Table Stand Cart

This mobile laptop computer stand cart is perfect for your mobile computing needs. This rolling cart is compact and sturdy and has plenty of surface space for your working needs. This cart can also be used as an over the bed table; adjust the height to fit your bed and roll the table cart over your bed.

Adjustable height: 30-40
Top Table Top Is 30 by 15
4 Swivel casters allow for maximum stability & mobility
The frame is constructed with tubular steel and a durable, and brushed aluminum finish
Adjustable table with fixed top desig
Multi-purpose stand
SOME ASSEMBLY IS REQUIRED
*The height adjustment knob needs to be inserted before the being installed into the base*

Product Description:
The swingaway attachment is made to allow the wheelchair carrier (or other hitch mounted device) to be swung out of the way of the truck bed or hatch. A Class III 2 hitch is required to use this attachment. The swingaway is constructed out of durable black powder coated steel and is extremely strong.

To use simply assemble the attachment , slide into hitch receiver and place the hitch pin. Now the swingaway attachment can be used as a normal receiver for a wheel chair carrier or other hitch mounted device.

Swingaway Attachment Specifications

Swingarm length:32
2 Hitch receiver is required
Extends length from receiver by 12
Weight limit 350 lbs.

Product Description:
This 2 foot aluminum threshold ramp is made of rust proof steel and features a slip resistant design. The 2 foot ramp is perfect for crossing of doorways and other small transitions.

Specifications

Unfolded dimensions: 2 Feet (Long) x 28.75 Inches (Wide) x 3 Inches (Thick)
Folded Dimensions: 2 Feet (Long) x 14.75 Inches (Wide) x 1.75 Inches (Thick)
ADA maxium recommended height: 2 (ADA recommends a maxium or 1 inches or rise for every 12 inches of travel)
Very light at only 11lbs
600lb weight limit

Product Description:
This aluminum folding wheelchair ramp features a very safe slip resistant surface to prevent slipping. The wheelchair ramp is made of rust proof aluminum. The ramp is a 2 piece design when not installed. When the ramp is installed 2 ramps are securely connected by 4 hinges.

Specifications

Unfolded dimensions: 8 Feet (long) x 29.25 (wide)
Folded dimensions: 55 (long) x 15 (tall) x 9 (wide)
47lbs total weight
23lbs per ramp
600lb weight limit

Product Name: Door Pull Up Bar For P90X
Product Description:
This is a premium quality Chin-Up Pull-Up Bar that has a total of 12 separate grip locations. (Most sellers only offer 8 to 10 grips).
This gives you an option to perform a larger variety of exercises using different hand positions, targeting different muscles and areas of body.

Perfect for P90X Fitness Program.

Product Description:
A weighted vest can be a valuable tool for strength and endurance training! For professional and amateur athletes, men and women alike, this vest will provide increased resistance that will help to develop strength necessary to increase speed, endurance, quickness, overall fitness and strength.

You can increase the level of intensity during exercise by incorporating a weighted vest into weight loss training, aerobic conditioning, cardio training, circuit training, jump training and more.

This added resistance is very similar to body weight plyometrics, allowing you to train using your natural bio-mechanics.

Burn more calories while building a stronger core!

The 20 and 30 Pound vests are fastened by Velcro as pictured, and they are adjustable to fit a variety of body weights and heights.

It's made with secure fasteners, and high-quality durable nylon.

Product Name: Inversion Table Back Pain Exercise Therapy fitness
Product Description:
This inversion table is designed for optimum safety! Inversion therapy involves hanging upside down to use your body weight and the force of gravity as traction to release pressure and stress on your spinal cord. learning how to use this inversion table correctly can reduce pressure on nerves, and help relax tense muscles. Inversion tables are known to help you relieve back pain naturally, in your own home, providing you fast and natural back pain relief!

Features:

Heavy Duty and Durable Steel Construction
Strong Durable Nylon Bed
Protective Secure Ankle Collars
Handle Bar Return Arms
Foldable and Lightweight For Easy Storage from any inversion angle
Adjustable Height Range from 4 foot 10 to 6 foot 6 inches Folded
Dimensions 12 inches wide 4 '6 Height 27 inches width
Rubber Skid Mounts for added Stability and Safety as you invert, mount and dismount
Easy to Reach Foam padded Handlebars Smoothly Rotate full 90 degrees
Adjustable Pivoting Arms Adjustable Nylon Straps to restrict the inversion degree
Max Weight Capacity 300Lbs

Product Description:
The VENTAFISH J & Circle Dehooker was developed by commercial grouper fisherman looking for a more efficient method of unhooking their catch. Made from medical-grade stainless steel, the J & Circle Dehooker features a unique offset tip which promotes the specific type of motion required to easily remove J and Circle hooks. The J & Circle Dehooker is also designed with an offset tip for additional leverage and a comfortable handle grip.

Includes full color instructions. Size: 16-1/2'' overall length; 15'' stainless steel section.

Product Description:
The kayak dolly cart is made of rust free aluminum and air filled rubber tires. The dolly cart is made to assist with transporting a canoe or kayak to the water. The cart is very easy to use and extremely convenient! The support bars features soft foam padding to prevent any scratching or other damage to the kayak or canoe. This aluminum kayak dolly provides a stronger longer lasting dolly compared to PVC dolly carts. This dolly can act as a canoe dolly or kayak dolly, the dolly is made of strong aluminum and can support the heaviest canoes.

To use this canoe dolly simply lift one end of the canoe in the air and slide the dolly underneath the lifted end and lower the canoe onto the dolly. Lift and carry the opposite end to transport to the water.

Kayak Dolly Cart Specifications

Rust Free Aluminum
Air filled rubber tires
Bar length:10.5
Dolly inside width:8.5
Dolly inside height:5.25
Wheel height:10.5
Wheel width:3
Weight limit: 125lb
*This kayak/canoe dolly is intended for use with canoes, kayaks and other light water craft that are not powered by a motor. Will not support a jet ski, small boat, pontoon boat etc.*

Product Description:
*This kayak dolly is the same design and functionality of the kayak dolly with air tires. The only difference is the solid rubber tires.*

The kayak dolly cart is made of rust proof aluminum and solid rubber tires.The kayak dolly is made to assist with transporting a canoe or kayak to the water. The cart is very easy to use and extremely convenient! The support bars features soft foam padding to prevent any scratching or other damage to the kayak or canoe. This aluminum kayak dolly provides a stronger longer lasting dolly compared to PVC kayak dolly carts.

The Kayak dolly is extremely easy to use, simply lift the rear or front of the kayak and slide the kayak dolly underneath and you are ready to go.

We chose to have these kayak carts made of aluminum to provide a rust free product that will last.The solid wheels are perfect for transporting a kayak across smooth roads that do not require an air filled tire.

Kayak Dolly Cart Specifications

Rust Proof Aluminum
Solid Rubber Tires
Bar length:10.5
Dolly inside width:8.5
Dolly inside height:5.25
Wheel height:7.5
Wheel width:1.75
Weight limit: 125lbs
*This kayak/canoe dolly is intended for use with canoes, kayaks and other light water craft that are not powered by a motor. Will not support a jet ski, small boat, pontoon boat etc.*

Product Description:
Resistance bands are a very effective piece of exercise equipment. These exercise bands can be used anywhere and will allow you to perform a fat burning muscle building workout.

Included with this kit are 2 handles, 2 Velcro straps and a very convenient mesh carrying bag. The handles and straps connect to the resistance bands with included caribiners. More than one resistance band can be used at a single time as well.

Resistance Bands Specifications

5 resistance bands included with varying levels of resistance
2 handles
2 Velcro straps to attach to stationary object or legs
Mesh carrying case

Product Description:
Our Running Parachutes are excellent tools to increase both your speed and strength for your running and athletic sports. Most runners are unaware of the use of running parachutes or even the method in which they increase your speed and strength. There is untapped potential in your running strength and speed that can be found by the use of a running parachute. These are great tools for sprinters but can also benefit long distance runners.

The running parachute is a parachute that is attached to the runner and after a certain speed is made the parachute provides resistance in which the runner will now run against. This resistance is similar to weight training in how strength and performance is improved. Almost all athletes use strength training to improve their performance, the running parachute is designed on the same principles of strength training.

The running parachute comes in 3 sizes and allows progressive resistance. Along with more resistance with larger sizes the faster the runner runs the more resistance is produced by the running parachute. This progressive resistance allows for improvement for your running strength and speed over time.We are confident that you will be satisfied with the addition of a running parachute into your running training program.

Product Description:
The Overdrive SportsGear indoor adjustable tension bike trainer is perfect for cyclist looking to train indoors during harsh weather. The trainer features 7 levels of adjustable resistance and has a magnetic motor. The trainer fits tire sizes 26 to 28 or 700c wheels. The bike attaches to the trainer by the use of the locking nuts on your rear bike tire.
Adjustable Tension Bike Trainer Specifications
7 Levels of resistance
Fits wheel sizes: 26, 27, 700c
Highly portable and easy setup!
3 wheel roller
400lb Weight Limit
Train indoors when the weather is inhospitable - from sprints, to intervals, to a long cruise, this trainer will provide you with the ride you want. This trainer is ideal for bringing your road-work indoors whether you're a seasoned pro or just starting your bike training.

FEATURES:

Increase resistance by shifting through the gears on your bike using the internal magnet system for an easy ride
Quick release lever
Larger-than-average 3 in. roller reduces tire wear
Heavy-Duty construction - this trainer can take your punishment
21.5 inch extra wide frame base provides maximum stability
Frame is welded to ensure it holds your bike level
Dimensions: 21.5x18.5x15 (W x D x H)
Mounting cups ensure that your bike won't slip out of your trainer
Engineered for fast setup and removal
Highly portable - take it with you!
Compatible with all bikes with a 26 to 28 or 700c wheel
Trainer folds in half for easy transport and off-season storage
Quick release levers for getting your bike out fast and easy

Product Description:
Florida Tupelo Honey - 1 pound bottle

The Apalachicola River in the Florida Panhandle is the center for Tupelo honey.

Tupelos are valued honey plants in the southeastern United States, particularly in the Gulf Coast region, producing a very light, mild-tasting honey.

Florida Tupelo Honey derives from the Tupelo Tree and has a mild and very delicious flavor.

Pure Tupelo honey has a slight greenish cast and a light golden amber color.

Our pure Tupelo honey is not heated, processed, or filtered; neither is it mixed in any amount with honey procured from other blossoms.

Florida is the main producer of Tupelo honey and because of it's distinctive flavor and non granulation it's recognized the crown jewel of honeys!

Taste the satisfaction of one of the finest tasting honeys in the world!

Ships in non-breakable and sealed plastic bottles!

Florida is the main producer of Tupelo honey and because of it's distinctive flavor and non granulation it's recognized the crown jewel of honeys!

Taste the satisfaction of one of the finest tasting honeys in the world!

Ships in non-breakable and sealed plastic bottles!

Product Description:
Tattoo Transfer Paper (100) ONE HUNDRED SHEETS- CASE

This paper is perfect for transferring flash art to skin.

Draw your stencils by hand.

Used with a Thermal Copier Machine, using heat to copy images onto the paper that can be transferred to the skin!

Special Coating protect hands/clothing.

Works with dot matrix printers, or you can draw your stencils by hand.


Quantity: 100 pcs

Measure: 8 1/2 x 11 inch

Each Thermal Paper has 4 layers:

*Top White Sheet -to which the design is applied

*Protective Sheet - Normally removed prior to use

*Carbon Sheet - The black/blue coating is transferred to the upper sheet by pressing on this layer

*Yellow Backing Sheet- Keeps the original in place when using a stencil copy machine

Please Note: The master cardboard box is included!!

Product Description:
This kit is designed to provide an easily lightweight transportable studio photography kit. This portable professional photography kit will bathe your subject in adjustable light and eliminate shadows which will help provide you with the perfect still shot! The strobe lights each have an adjustable turn knob flash output (1/32 - full power). Visit your local photography store and you will quickly discover the retail value of this kit to most likely be in excess of $1,299!

Briefcase Contents Include:

* 2 strobe lights,
* 1 sync flash light,
* 3 stands to hold each light,
* 2 soft lighting boxes,
* gold/ silver double sided reflector,
* wireless sync remote camera attachment,
* a 4 leaf barn door,
* 4 colored gels,
* a honeycomb light filter
* snoot, 1 6x9' Black Musli
* 1 6x9' White Musli
* 1 HUGE 10x20' Grey Muslin Backdrop
* and lots of individual item inner cases for each items protection and separatio

* 5600K color temperature
* 110-130 Volt
* Flash: maximum 160 watts (joule) per second
* Recharge Time ranges from 0.5-3 seconds
* Flash Duration: 1/600 second at t=0.1; 1/1000 second @ t=.05
* Flash tube lifetime: approximately 8k flashes
* Slave Effectiveness: 35' (10m)
* 5 amp fuse (spares included)
* Sync Volt: 5v
* E-14 screw
* Guide No.: 120'/36m ISO100
* Light Range of 55 degrees
* Weight 1.8 pounds (800g)
* Measures approximately f4-7.5 (f100-195mm)

Included is a heavy duty lightweight aluminum telescoping tripod stand (2) with an interlocking support beams and a custom carrying case. This kit is designed to hold your muslin, canvas or paper backdrop material for your photo or video shoot. All sections are easily transported and stored inside the custom storage carrying case. It quickly sets up in about 5 minutes.

2 SOFT LIGHTING BOXES:
You will find 2 professional series lighting boxes conveniently stored away inside the free travel bag. Within a few minutes, it sets up nearly anywhere you desire. Each is constructed of a metal frame, outer matte black surface, inner highly reflective diffusion surface, and an optional soft white light diffuser. Each is designed to control light, hot spots, and shadows. Each box measures approximately 20x28.

SYNCH FLASH B (45w/sec):
The sync flash will automatically flash when either of the other strobes fires. It is an excellent photographers tool for fill or back lighting. When used in conjunction with the gold umbrella supplied, it will provide a soft glow to the photography subject. The sync flash also includes a hands free adjustable umbrella holder to allow precision soft glow.

Gold Umbrella:
Designed to connect to the sync flash stand (mentioned/ pictured above). It's purpose is to provide a soft uniform glow to the photographed subject.

2 Professional Studio Strobe Lights:
If you recently have shopped at your local photography store, then you probably know the retail price of only 1 light is easily $150! Each light is constructed of the highest quality materials to ensure a long life. Each light boasts 160 watts of power per second! The combined 320 watts are fully adjustable when less light is required by simply turning a knob. Many professionals use the strobes for a variety of purposes; such as, back light, fill light, primary light, or even hair light. This lighting set is a key ingredient for any professional still shot.

3 Lightweight Fully Adjustable Aluminum Light Stands:
2 matching stands that range in height from 37-84 and a third stand that extends 18-39. Each collapses into a compact and easily transportable size- tucks away into the storage bag. All 3 stands are very stable providing a wide stance. They each are constructed of a heavy duty lightweight aluminum with riveted joints and reinforced brace supports.

3 Muslin Backdrops:
Include a black, white and gray cotton muslin backdrops. Each is constructed of a completely seamless, highly woven, texture/ grain free cotton fabric. 2 free custom cases are included to house the muslin cloths and to protect and help keep clean. The grey muslin measures and enormous 10x20' to provide a backdrop large enough for nearly any group or subject. Also included are both a black and white 6x9' muslin cotton backdrop. Each can be hung using our backdrop stand, clamps or even tacks/ nails (muslin stand recommended but not included with this ad- see our other similar ad if needed). Each includes a 4 rod pocket for the muslin stand beam to slide through. There are crimped edges to prevent tears. The black and gray (white not dyed) muslin use high quality dyes which reduce color deviation, prevent fading/ wear with proper use and storage. Each is machine washable.

Reflector:
1 22 (56cm) Gold & Silver (double sided) collapsible reflector. Free storage bag included. Another tool for the professional photographer.

1 four Leaf Barn Door, 4 gels, 1 honeycomb, and 1 snoot attachment:
The barn door purpose is to help control light spill. It easily attaches to the strobe head. Constructed of metal with 4 hinged adjustable flaps. There are 4 gel color (red, blue, white, and yellow) attachments for correcting/ adjusting the light balance or to create lighting effects. The honeycomb grid is designed to emit a precisely positioned beam of light. And finally the snoot attachment prevents spill over light.

1 Remote Sync Transmitter:
This remote will tie all the lights together to synchronize each flash at once. The receiver will connect to one of the strobe lights and activates all flashes at once when the signal is received. Each strobe also includes a built-in slave sensor that is designed to activate with the primary strobe. The remote wireless transmitter mounts onto the hot shoe of your camera (auxiliary flash mount). Every time you snap a photo, all strobes will fire automatically. It works will nearly all 35mm SLR cameras. Each remote has 2 channels.

Custom Master Case:
And finally to house all the above items, we are including a custom designed master case. It is specifically designed to protect and organize the entire kit. It is constructed of an all-weather material to help protect your expensive photography tools from bad weather while traveling or dust while being stored. 2 hand straps and a shoulder strap allow this complete kit to be easily transported or stored. We even left some room for you to add other accessories such as film, memory cards, etc..

Product Description:
This lighting kit is designed to provide an easily lightweight transportable studio photography kit. This portable professional photography kit will bathe your subject in adjustable light and eliminate shadows which will help provide you with the perfect still shot! The strobe lights each have an adjustable turn knob flash output (1/32 - full power). Visit your local photography store and you will quickly discover the retail value of this kit to most likely be in excess of $1,299!

Briefcase Contents Include:

2 strobe lights,
1 sync flash light,
3 stands to hold each light,
2 soft lighting boxes,
gold/ silver double sided reflector,
wireless sync remote camera attachment,
a 4 leaf barn door,
4 colored gels,
a honeycomb light filter
snoot, 1 6x9' Black Musli
1 6x9' White Musli
1 HUGE 10x20' Grey Muslin Backdrop
and lots of individual item inner cases for each items protection and separatio

5600K color temperature
110-130 Volt
Flash: maximum 160 watts (joule) per second
Recharge Time ranges from 0.5-3 seconds
Flash Duration: 1/600 second at t=0.1; 1/1000 second @ t=.05
Flash tube lifetime: approximately 8k flashes
Slave Effectiveness: 35' (10m)
5 amp fuse (spares included)
Sync Volt: 5v
E-14 screw
Guide No.: 120'/36m ISO100
Light Range of 55 degrees
Weight 1.8 pounds (800g)
Measures approximately f4-7.5 (f100-195mm)

2 SOFT LIGHTING BOXES:
You will find 2 professional series lighting boxes conveniently stored away inside the free travel bag. Within a few minutes, it sets up nearly anywhere you desire. Each is constructed of a metal frame, outer matte black surface, inner highly reflective diffusion surface, and an optional soft white light diffuser. Each is designed to control light, hot spots, and shadows. Each box measures approximately 20x28.

SYNC FLASH B (45w/sec):
The sync flash will automatically flash when either of the other strobes fires. It is an excellent photographers tool for fill or back lighting. When used in conjunction with the gold umbrella supplied, it will provide a soft glow to the photography subject. The sync flash also includes a hands free adjustable umbrella holder to allow precision soft glow.

Gold Umbrella:
Designed to connect to the sync flash stand (mentioned/ pictured above). It's purpose is to provide a soft uniform glow to the photographed subject.

Professional Studio Strobe Lights:
If you recently have shopped at your local photography store, then you probably know the retail price of only 1 light is easily $150! Each light is constructed of the highest quality materials to ensure a long life. Each light boasts 160 watts of power per second! The combined 320 watts are fully adjustable when less light is required by simply turning a knob. Many professionals use the strobes for a variety of purposes; such as, back light, fill light, primary light, or even hair light. This lighting set is a key ingredient for any professional still shot.

3 Lightweight Fully Adjustable Aluminum Light Stands:
2 matching stands that range in height from 37-84 and a third stand that extends 18-39. Each collapses into a compact and easily transportable size- tucks away into the storage bag. All 3 stands are very stable providing a wide stance. They each are constructed of a heavy duty lightweight aluminum with riveted joints and reinforced brace supports.

3 Muslin Backdrops:
Included are a black, white and gray cotton muslin backdrops. Each is constructed of a completely seamless, highly woven, texture/ grain free cotton fabric. 2 free custom cases are included to house the muslin cloths and to protect and help keep clean. The gray muslin measures and enormous 10x20' to provide a backdrop large enough for nearly any group or subject. Also included are both a black and white 6x9' muslin cotton backdrop. Each can be hung using our backdrop stand, clamps or even tacks/ nails (muslin stand recommended but not included with this ad- see our other similar ad if needed). Each includes a 4 rod pocket for the muslin stand beam to slide through. There are crimped edges to prevent tears. The black and gray (white not dyed) muslin use high quality dyes which reduce color deviation, prevent fading/ wear with proper use and storage. Each is machine washable.

Reflector:
1 22 (56cm) Gold & Silver (double sided) collapsible reflector. Free storage bag included. Another tool for the professional photographer.

1 four Leaf Barn Door, 4 gels, 1 honeycomb, and 1 snoot attachment:
The barn door purpose is to help control light spill. It easily attaches to the strobe head. Constructed of metal with 4 hinged adjustable flaps. There are 4 gel color (red, blue, white, and yellow) attachments for correcting/ adjusting the light balance or to create lighting effects. The honeycomb grid is designed to emit a precisely positioned beam of light. And finally the snoot attachment prevents spill over light.

Remote Sync Transmitter:
This remote will tie all the lights together to synchronize each flash at once. The receiver will connect to one of the strobe lights and activates all flashes at once when the signal is received. Each strobe also includes a built-in slave sensor that is designed to activate with the primary strobe. The remote wireless transmitter mounts onto the hot shoe of your camera (auxiliary flash mount). Every time you snap a photo, all strobes will fire automatically. It works will nearly all 35mm SLR cameras. Each remote has 2 channels.

Custom Master Case:
And finally to house all the above items, we are including a custom designed master case. It is specifically designed to protect and organize the entire kit. It is constructed of an all-weather material to help protect your expensive photography tools from bad weather while traveling or dust while being stored. 2 hand straps and a shoulder strap allow this complete kit to be easily transported or stored. We even left some room for you to add other accessories such as film, memory cards, etc..

Product Description:

Product Name: LED Solar Powered Light Kit for Flagpoles
Product Description:
LED Solar Powered Flagpole Light
Product Descriptio

The Prohoists Flagpoles LED Solar Light has 20 Ultra- Bright LEDs and is rated for up to 100,000 hours of use. The Solar panels collect light during the day and beautifully illuminate your flag at night.


Features:

FREE: (3) rechargeable AA NiCad batteries (Included)
Our LED Solar Powered Flagpole Light will work any topper 1/2 or under in diameter hole through the light.
Easily attaches to Gold Ball Flagpole Topper (Not Included) or Gold Eagle Finial (Not Included)
Our light illuminates your flag or flags consistently for up 8 hours or more.
o External Wiring is needed
10 Inch in diameter flagpole solar light housing unit
Made of Flame retardant and weather proof ABS Plastic.

Prohoists Flagpoles recommends using this product with an in ground sectional flagpoles or telescoping flagpoles from 15 to 25 feet. (Flagpole Not Included)

Product Description:
NEW WHEEL TIRE BOOT LOCK

For Parking Enforcement, Lawn Tractors, Police/Law Enforcement, Golf Carts Boat Trailers

DESCRIPTION:

The Heavy Duty Wheel lock will foil the plans of thieves and vandals. Shown here attached to a wheel making it impossible to easily steal your equipment and ruin your day. Works just like a Denver Boot Wheel Lock, except you do not owe a bunch of money in parking tickets. This wheel works on everything from utility vehicles and trailers to cars and pick up trucks.

Prevent the theft of your mower, compressor, John Deere Gator, tractor, golf cart, ATV, motorcycle, trailers or any other wheeled equipment that is prone to be stolen. Very similar in looks and application to the famous Denver Boot, which is used by cities to lock the cars of parking ticket scofflaws.

The Heavy Duty Wheel lock is adjustable in width and comes with keys. Stop the thieves from moving your equipment from where you parked it and send them somewhere else to do their misdeeds!

This is also an excellent tool to prevent parking in unassigned areas at your office, apartment complex, school, etc.

Please do not use the wheel boot to play pranks on your buddies!
